page.title: 05 Modern Fashions
page.content: Most children have to wear school uniform when they come to school.This includes shirt with collar and cuffs,a tie,a jumper,a blazer and skirt or trousers.When we leave school most of us will change into casual clothes which will probably be jeans,a tee-shirt and a sweat shirt.These are about the most comfortable clothes there are.For sports people wear shorts made of cotton and a cotton shirt.If it is cold people might wear a new sort of clothing called Jogging suits.These are made of warm materials which are warm.They are fairly large and hang loosely.These are used for sport as well.More formal clothes would be a tie,a shirt and a pair of trousers.
